title: This Is Your Brain On A Bike
teaser: If you’re an avid cyclist, you may already track your miles and calories. But have you ever imagined trying to track your state of mind?
contentencoded:
If you’re an avid bicyclist who’s into stats, you may already have clip-on gadgets that track your miles and calories. But have you ever imagined trying to track your state of mind? From Here & Now’s tech partner IEEE Spectrum, Eliza Strickland took to the streets of Brooklyn to check out MindRider, a new bike helmet that may change the way you ride.

Reporter

  • Eliza Strickland, associate editor at IEEE Spectrum. She tweets @newsbeagle.
